title: 6300 IP and can't decide on what champ to buy
body:
{{champion:126}} I played him a lot on my old account... Pretty much mained him (Season 3). He was pretty fun.

{{champion:245}} Played him when he was free, not since the post-release nerfs, though. He was pretty fun, too.

{{champion:121}} Mained in Season 2, had an 86% win rate... Not as hilariously fun since nerfs, but still okay.

{{champion:107}} Secondary main in Season 2. Win rate almost as high as Kha's. Not as hilariously fun since nerfs, but still okay.

{{champion:157}} Mained him in Season 4. Not sure where he's at right now. Was super fun.


(Yes I'm a filthy assassin main. Don't judge. I enjoy the fast pace)
